question: Which of the following is true regarding lattice formation
exp: Lattice formation is possible only in the zone of equivalence. in the zones of antibody or antigen excess lattice doesn't enlarge as their respective valencies are stisfied, this lattice hypothesis holds good for agglutination also. Ref: anantnarayan and panikers 10 th edition.
opa: Associated with precipitation and not agglutination
opb: Associated with agglutination and not precipitation
opc: Associated with both precipitation and agglutination
opd: Associated with neither precipitation and nor agglutination
